reuters.title: ELXSI <ELXSF> WINS MCDONNELL DOUGLAS <MD> ORDER
reuters.body: Elxsi Ltd said it sold three computer systems worth four mln dlrs to Douglas Aircraft Co, a unit of McDonnell Douglas Corp. The company said the systems will be used in the C-17 military transport program. One was shipped last month and two others will be shipped in June, it said. Reuter 
